text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Companies (Corporate Governance, 
Enforcement and Regulatory Provisions) Act 2024 (Commencement) Order

title: Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)),
Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)),
heading: 2. The 16th day of July 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 22 of
text_raw:
2. The 16th day of July 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 22 of 
(Corporate Governance, Enforcement and Regulatory 

the Companies 
Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 44 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 July, 2025. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Tourism and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th July, 2025.
